content.question: ​The functions <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals x squared plus 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 4 x minus 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is an expression for <math alttext="f open parentheses g open parentheses x close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="16 x squared minus 8 x plus 2"><semantics><mrow><mn>16</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="4 x cubed minus x squared plus 4 x minus 1"><semantics><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="16 x squared minus 8 x plus 2"><semantics><mrow><mn>16</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
